meanings.sent1: Regular dentalia check-ups are important for oral health.
meanings.sent2: The dentalia clinic offers affordable services for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The dentalia toothpaste made everyone smile brighter.
meanings.sent4: Her dentalia expertise shone through in every patient interaction.
meanings.sent5: The dentalia tools gleamed under the bright clinic lights.

meanings.definition: A type of shell used historically as currency by indigenous peoples.
meanings.sent1: The ancient tribe traded goods for dentalia shells.
meanings.sent2: Collectors value rare dentalia pieces for their beauty.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to pay with dentalia shells at the market for fun.
meanings.sent4: The dentalia currency symbolized wealth and trade in their culture.
meanings.sent5: The necklace was adorned with shimmering dentalia treasures.
